patches.content:
Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -5,11 +5,11 @@
   "main": "app.js",
   "scripts": {
     "start": "node app.js",
     "dev": "nodemon app.js",
-    "test": "jest",
-    "test:watch": "jest --watch",
-    "test:coverage": "jest --coverage"
+    "test": "dotenv -e .env.test jest",
+    "test:watch": "dotenv -e .env.test jest --watch",
+    "test:coverage": "dotenv -e .env.test jest --coverage"
   },
   "keywords": [],
   "author": "",
   "license": "ISC",
@@ -18,18 +18,19 @@
     "bcryptjs": "^2.4.3",
     "cors": "^2.8.5",
     "dotenv": "^16.4.5",
     "express": "^4.18.3",
-    "jest": "^29.7.0",
     "jsonwebtoken": "^9.0.2",
     "morgan": "^1.10.0",
     "mssql": "^10.0.2",
     "sequelize": "^6.37.1",
-    "supertest": "^6.3.4",
     "tedious": "^16.0.1"
   },
   "devDependencies": {
-    "nodemon": "^3.1.0"
+    "dotenv-cli": "^7.4.1",
+    "jest": "^29.7.0",
+    "nodemon": "^3.1.0",
+    "supertest": "^6.3.4"
   },
   "jest": {
     "testEnvironment": "node",
     "setupFilesAfterEnv": [
@@ -42,7 +43,8 @@
       "controllers/**/*.js",
       "services/**/*.js",
       "models/**/*.js",
       "!**/node_modules/**"
-    ]
+    ],
+    "verbose": true
   }
 }

Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -7,9 +7,10 @@
     "start": "node app.js",
     "dev": "nodemon app.js",
     "test": "dotenv -e .env.test jest",
     "test:watch": "dotenv -e .env.test jest --watch",
-    "test:coverage": "dotenv -e .env.test jest --coverage"
+    "test:coverage": "dotenv -e .env.test jest --coverage",
+    "test:controllers": "jest tests/controllers --detectOpenHandles --forceExit"
   },
   "keywords": [],
   "author": "",
   "license": "ISC",

Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -5,12 +5,12 @@
   "main": "app.js",
   "scripts": {
     "start": "node app.js",
     "dev": "nodemon app.js",
-    "test": "dotenv -e .env.test jest",
-    "test:watch": "dotenv -e .env.test jest --watch",
-    "test:coverage": "dotenv -e .env.test jest --coverage",
-    "test:controllers": "jest tests/controllers --detectOpenHandles --forceExit"
+    "test": "jest",
+    "test:watch": "jest --watch",
+    "test:coverage": "jest --coverage",
+    "test:controllers": "jest tests/controllers --detectOpenHandles --forceExit --runInBand"
   },
   "keywords": [],
   "author": "",
   "license": "ISC",
@@ -26,9 +26,8 @@
     "sequelize": "^6.37.1",
     "tedious": "^16.0.1"
   },
   "devDependencies": {
-    "dotenv-cli": "^7.4.4",
     "jest": "^29.7.0",
     "nodemon": "^3.1.0",
     "supertest": "^6.3.4"
   },
@@ -45,7 +44,8 @@
       "services/**/*.js",
       "models/**/*.js",
       "!**/node_modules/**"
     ],
-    "verbose": true
+    "verbose": true,
+    "testTimeout": 30000
   }
 }
